The sender to check","vaultId":"uint256 The vault Id to check"},"returns":{"_0":"bool True is the sender owns this vault Id False is the sender does not own this vault Id"}},"withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"uint256 the amount to withdraw","vaultId":"uint256 The vaultId from where to withdraw the funds"}}},"title":"Abstract contract inherited by all the vault contracts","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"claimRewardsFor(address)":{"notice":"Claims the pending reward for a user for a specific vault, the rewards are coming from the weekly distribution from Mai finance in Qi rewards, a user will be able to claim only once a week"},"claimableRewards(address)":{"notice":"Returns the amount of rewards a user can claim"},"constructor":{"notice":"When a new vault is created, it needs to add its collateral address, the vault type address in Mai finance and the period start at which it starts getting rewards from Mai Finance"},"createVault()":{"notice":"Create a new vault in Mai finance protocol for the sender"},"deposit(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Deposits funds from the user to the contract, then the contract deposit the funds to the chosen Mai vault"},"executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uint256[],address,bytes)":{"notice":"This is called after the contract has received the flash loaned amount"},"getAmountInMin(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the minimum amount in from a swap"},"getAmountOutMin(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Returns the minimum amount out from a swap"},"getMAIDebtForAmount(uint256)":{"notice":"Returns an estimate of MAI amount to borrow to create a new long"},"getMaxWithdrawableCollateral(uint256)":{"notice":"Return the max amount of collateral it is possible to withdraw with the current debt"},"getMinimumCollateralPercentage()":{"notice":"Get the minimum collateral percentage for this Mai vault type"},"getMultiplicatorMax100th()":{"notice":"Returns the multiplicator maximum one user can long an asset The result is given multiplied by 100 to keep 2 decimals precision, the caller needs to devide by 100"},"getPathSwap(address,address)":{"notice":"Get the path for the 2 tokens passed in parameters, since we use Quickswap for the swaps, will go through WMATIC token to create the swap"},"getUserVaultList()":{"notice":"Get all the vault Ids for the sender address"},"longAsset(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Borrows the required amount of USDC to buy the chosen amount of collateral to long, will repay the borrowed USDC by borrowing MAI from Mai finance's vault, the user ends up with a long position on the vault's collateral and a debt in MAI Credits to Abracadra finance for the idea"},"reduceLong(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Reduce the long amount by doing another flash loan in USDC to buy the MAI required to repay the desired amount, the contract will then withdraw the required collateral to repay the USDC debt"},"repay(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Repay the wanted amount of MAI from the user wallet to the chosen vault"},"updateRewardsBalance(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Function called by an external script that will update the number of rewards which the contract gets by period to be then shared by the users"},"userOwnsVault(uint256,address)":{"notice":"Check if the sener owns the vault Id passed in parameter"},"withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraw the collateral amount from the Mai vault calling withdrawFromVault(), then sends the fund back to the user"}},"notice":"Allows to interact with the Mai finance vaults in an easier way to long collateral devdoc.details: Will have to optimize the swaps when making the flash loan + check for slippage

claimRewardsFor(address).details: This is onlyOwner because it's supposed to be called by the admin contract only `HelperAdmin`

params.user: address The user to claim the rewards for

returns._0: uint256 The amount of rewards claimable for this user

params._maiVault: address The vault type address on Mai Finance
params._periodStart: uint256 The time at which the contract start earning rewards from Mai Finance (In seconds unix time)
params._quickswapRouterAddr: address the Quickswap router address to make the swaps
params.aaveLendingPoolAddr: address The lending pool address to make the flash loan

params.vaultId: uint256 The vaultId where to deposit the funds

params.amounts: uint256[] The list of amount borrowed for each asset
params.assets: address[] The list of asset addresses borrowed
params.initiator: address The address that intiated the flash loan (not used here)
params.params: bytes params sent by the caller
params.premiums: uint256[] The list of amount in fees for each borrowed asset

params.amount: uint256 The amount of collateral to long

returns._0: uint256 The amount of MAI to borrow to create the long

params.vaultId: uint256 The vault Id to check

returns._0: uint256 the max amount to withdraw
vaults uint256[] The list of vault Ids

params.vaultId: uint256 The vault Id where the user wants to create the long

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.debtAmountToReduce: The debt amount to reduce (In MAI)
params.vaultId: uint256 The vault Id where the user wants to reduce the long

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.amountToRepay: The amount of MAI to repay
params.vaultId: uint256 The vault Id to repay

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateRewardsBalance(uint256,uint256).details: This is only called by the contract's owner `HelperAdmin` which is itself called the protocol's owner

params.periodTimetart: uint256 The period for which the rewards amount is updated

params.vaultId: uint256 The vault Id to check

returns._0: bool True is the sender owns this vault Id False is the sender does not own this vault Id

params.vaultId: uint256 The vaultId from where to withdraw the funds

devdoc.title: Abstract contract inherited by all the vault contracts

claimRewardsFor(address).notice: Claims the pending reward for a user for a specific vault, the rewards are coming from the weekly distribution from Mai finance in Qi rewards, a user will be able to claim only once a week

claimableRewards(address).notice: Returns the amount of rewards a user can claim

constructor.notice: When a new vault is created, it needs to add its collateral address, the vault type address in Mai finance and the period start at which it starts getting rewards from Mai Finance

createVault().notice: Create a new vault in Mai finance protocol for the sender

deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposits funds from the user to the contract, then the contract deposit the funds to the chosen Mai vault

executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.notice: This is called after the contract has received the flash loaned amount

getAmountInMin(address,address,uint256).notice: Returns the minimum amount in from a swap

getAmountOutMin(address,address,uint256).notice: Returns the minimum amount out from a swap

getMAIDebtForAmount(uint256).notice: Returns an estimate of MAI amount to borrow to create a new long

getMaxWithdrawableCollateral(uint256).notice: Return the max amount of collateral it is possible to withdraw with the current debt

getMinimumCollateralPercentage().notice: Get the minimum collateral percentage for this Mai vault type

getMultiplicatorMax100th().notice: Returns the multiplicator maximum one user can long an asset The result is given multiplied by 100 to keep 2 decimals precision, the caller needs to devide by 100

getPathSwap(address,address).notice: Get the path for the 2 tokens passed in parameters, since we use Quickswap for the swaps, will go through WMATIC token to create the swap

getUserVaultList().notice: Get all the vault Ids for the sender address

longAsset(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Borrows the required amount of USDC to buy the chosen amount of collateral to long, will repay the borrowed USDC by borrowing MAI from Mai finance's vault, the user ends up with a long position on the vault's collateral and a debt in MAI Credits to Abracadra finance for the idea

reduceLong(uint256,uint256).notice: Reduce the long amount by doing another flash loan in USDC to buy the MAI required to repay the desired amount, the contract will then withdraw the required collateral to repay the USDC debt

repay(uint256,uint256).notice: Repay the wanted amount of MAI from the user wallet to the chosen vault

updateRewardsBalance(uint256,uint256).notice: Function called by an external script that will update the number of rewards which the contract gets by period to be then shared by the users

userOwnsVault(uint256,address).notice: Check if the sener owns the vault Id passed in parameter

withdrawCollateral(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw the collateral amount from the Mai vault calling withdrawFromVault(), then sends the fund back to the user

userdoc.notice: Allows to interact with the Mai finance vaults in an easier way to long collateral assets
